name: pureone
text: The real question is how many ejaculating robots does pat know?

name: aelindil
text: Knowing Vlad, I wouldn't be surprised if it were many.

name: saucy_jack
text: Is so many.

name: invidious
text: That comment will never have enough chubbies.  A perfect, sublime blend of comment and icon.

name: wonelove
text: Vlad himself speaketh.

name: mustakrakesh
text: This comment and avatar has reached the summit of internet forums.

name: cracklewater
text:
I'm overjoyed that this is an integrated piece of Achewood back-story/characterisation that I hadn't figured out until just now.

Pat's unkind words about Wheldon nearly cause Roast Beef to cast him into the Land of Hog Fluffing.

I thought Pat was simply being a general dick about Wheldon, but this strip shows that it's an act of specific dickishness based on a mostly-imagined slight from the past, as is most of Pat's dickery.

Excellent stuff!

name: cracklewater
text: Ah, it's 'Weldon'. Sorry.

name: deimosrising
text: A comment left by deimosrising was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by TommyTheBrat, SirFrederick, shammack, hellofditties, Panserbjorne)

name: centipede_damascus
text: Pat is very angry at himself for being that way.

name: toughasnails001
text: A comment left by toughasnails001 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by joeyramoney, nighttoad, relaxing, ActualTaunt, sumisueme)

name: jdhenry105
text: Did you just equate homosexuality and robo-beastiality?

name: johnnyrocker
text:
Yes he did. Basically.

It's always so funny when people do stuff like that.

"Oh man that gay guy accidentally had someone fart in his face! I bet he... secretly liked it..."

name: stereo
text: The name Rutherford indicates the dog is male, though.

name: epicurus
text:
To be fair, a lot of educational filmreels from the 1950's had some good data showing the link between homosexuality and robo-bestiality.

"One day, Jimmy notices that he feels the urge to hold hands with his friend Tim. About the same time, he starts to notice the Octo-Tron in new ways."

name: nabeel84
text: It ain't latent it's as clear as a king's decree

name: greenkoolayd
text: its not latent.

name: william
text: Ray taught the AIBO to hump people's legs when he says they are fine.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: I have never wanted a dog until you introduced the possibility of teaching it this trick. Thank you.

name: spinynorman
text:
The world will not know beauty until we have made a robot capable of ejaculating.

It is up to us gentlemen.

Well, it's that or getting a boat loan.

name: semiquaver
text: LAMERS!  Norman...is...fine!

name: gunsofray
text: I humped his leg. I didn't ejaculate.

name: selbencoirlo
text: dang man wouldn't that just be basically a gun though?

name: spinynorman
text:
I don't think the gun feels such blistering joy when getting fired. The shooter might, but not the gun.

Then after the joy comes the crippling shame and standing in front of the window at two in the morning while that dumbass girl you took home asks you what's wrong over and over again.

Ah, to be young.

name: woodenteeth
text: oh god... involuntary flashback.

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
wow. this is a memory i never want to have.

thank you for the cautionary tale.

name: hedonismbot
text: Ejaculating robots huh?

name: fattypneumonia
text: Chubby for the avatar.

name: ssddr
text: Pat is such an old timey guy, i really am not sure if he thinks the robot dog is capable of ejaculation, or if he thinks that ray is a moron for trying to comfort him with that fact

name: zem
text: stay off the beach pat

name: everything_is_a_hat
text: bout damn time someone shot that Morrissey character.

name: mrflunchy
text: A comment left by mrflunchy was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ohmygooses, pa_ass_nts, peterjoel)

name: gmm
text: He's a great songwriter and singer but a total goddamn jerk, so I'm ok with the shooting.

name: gazdatronik
text: it took me five minutes and the internet to figure out that first panel so many years ago.

name: obvious
text: I wonder if Vlad ejaculates.

name: zaratustra
text: ALT TEXT: Aw, he don't ejaculate none!

name: mastronaut
text: Only alt text I know before I mouse-over. It was also the time that I resolved to use more Achewood Slang.

name: professorhazard
text: It automatically reads in the head as though Curly Howard is saying it, and that's why this strip is a five.

name: nice-on-water
text: I imagine a Lawdy Lawdy type old Negro.  I am not racist.

name: mashuren
text:
The alt text for this one is brilliant. It reminds me of some old-timey TV show, like Dennis the Menace or something. "DENNIS! Get this mangy mutt off of me this instant!"

"Aw, shucks, Mr. Wilson, he don't ejaculate none!"

name: aperson
text: I'm thinking Gentle Ben. "Aw. He's just maulin' ya, mister! 'Taint sexual or nothin"

name: cdtm
text: A comment left by cdtm was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by mr_lostman28, equinn2006, Circadin)

name: shoinan
text: There's only one real way to find out if a robot ejaculates if you know what I mean, nudge nudge.

name: jujubeesforjesus
text: WHY FIND OUT?

name: boyd
text: BOO TO THAT.

name: straw
text: OWRP!

name: estutius
text: Panel 1 on its own is 5-worthy.

name: ninjaein
text: Pat deserved every last bit of Ray's little joke.

name: tekende
text: What? Nobody shot Morrissey.

name: vreeeee
text: Didn't you know He Is The Quarry?

name: tekende
text: But he's also Your Arsenal and the Ringleader of the Tormenters. I don't really know if there's a connection here, I'm just saying stuff.

name: st-elmos_fire
text:
You are lead through torment to use him to shoot you, as in in fact You are the Quarry

He also has Bona Drag

name: fineoakstructure
text: Also: Vauxhall & Him.

name: invidious
text: This is why reality is crap.

name: gopacapulco
text: A comment left by gopacapulco was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by tekende, St-Elmos_Fire, miaou)

name: charchar
text: What kind of crappy robo-dog doesn't ejaculate?  Pat got screwed on that one.

name: catgrl131
text: [innuendo]Yes. Yes he did.[/innuendo]

name: charchar
text: Chubbied for BBCoding {i]innuendo[/i].

name: crankheart
text: i like morrissey...and yet this strip is my most-used wallpaper.

name: mikeronomicon
text: This gets a five for dead Morrissey and robo-ejaculate.

name: hobit
text: this strip is a SIX

name: swordsower
text: And how would Ray know they don't ejaculate?  Is it in the manual?

name: cpnglxynchos
text: if they did, it'd be from hydraulics and be a major design flaw.
